experienceData.description: Currently Contributing to Sunbird ED Building Blocks, highly scalable open-source learning products, utilized by Diksha (https://diksha.gov.in/explore) as an adopter for the client Ekstep(https://ekstep.org/).

details: Spearheaded the development of Sunbird ED Portal, employing Angular 12+, NodeJS, and Form APIs to create a scalable and user-friendly platform
Analyzed business and functional requirements to engineer efficient technical solutions.
Engineered key features for ED, transitioning hardcoded framework logic to framework-agnostic solutions, enabling broader application.
Produced user-friendly technical documentation and architecture designs to streamline adoption by external stakeholders.
Implemented rigorous unit tests using the Jest Framework to ensure robust code quality and reliability.
Managed and enhanced Angular libraries, ensuring alignment with security standards and compatibility with cutting-edge technologies.
